context_bundle.summary: Windows user account mismatch - script user vs application user

onboarding.quick_start: $env:USERPROFILE may not match where apps store config
symptoms: Config written but app doesn't see it
Works for some users, fails for others on same machine

root_cause.scenario: User logs in as 'localuser', but Claude Desktop runs under Microsoft account 'email@outlook.com'
root_cause.result: Script writes to C:\Users\localuser, app reads from C:\Users\email
root_cause.detection: Multiple folders in C:\Users with Claude AppData

solution.step_1: Scan all C:\Users profiles for app's AppData folder
solution.step_2: If multiple found, prompt user to select
solution.step_3: Write config to selected profile, not $env:USERPROFILE
